# automaticallyPublishesNowPlayingInfo

**Instance Property**

A Boolean that indicates whether Now Playing info automatically publishes.

## Declaration

```swift
var automaticallyPublishesNowPlayingInfo: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

You can set Now Playing information keys for automatic publishing on [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/nowPlayingInfo].



## Configuring Now Playing information

- **nowPlayingInfoCenter**: The Now Playing information center associated with the session.
